snippet.title: Forest Heroes - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: Check out gameplay from Forest Heroes in this trailer for the upcoming rogue-like deck-building tower defense game. Forest Heroes will be available on PC. A vast forest teeming with life, Noctful, has flourished for ages under the protection of mushroom magic-wielding elves. However, a deeply resentful oak has cursed and corrupted the forest. As a guardian elf, rally animal allies and use mushroom skills to defend your base and purify the forest!
